alert.note: Alert for Lawrence (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 18 at 1:02AM EST until February 19 at 3:30AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM EST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...REPLACES FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of western Pennsylvania, including the following county, Lawrence. * WHEN...Until 430 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 102 AM EST, local law enforcement reported heavy rain in New Castle. Overflowing poor drainage areas have already caused minor flooding in New Castle. Between 1 and 1.5 inches of rain have fallen. - New Castle is the most likely place to experience minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... New Castle, Ellwood City, Oakwood, New Castle Northwest, New Beaver, Bessemer, Wampum, South New Castle, Harlansburg, S.n.p.j. and Rose Point Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
